data.title: 8th International Conference on Language Documentation & Conservation
data.meta_description: Check out what Gina Scarpete Walters will be attending at 8th International Conference on Language Documentation & Conservation
data.text:
Welcome to ICLDC 8!

As a reminder, to gain full access to presentations, YouTube links, and other conference-related activities, you must be registered for the conference (deadline February 28, 2023) and logged in to your account in Sched. For more about how our conference will run, please see our orientation and overview document.

Later this spring, we will make the ICLDC 8 program public, so anyone interested can view our presentation recordings and links.
